mainText:
I truly believe that Apple has changed the way technology is used in the
world as we know it,
and I think that a lot of the sweat and grit that went into that from the
beginning was Steve's.
Thank you all for making Apple what it is today, and thank you Steve for
pushing the company to break-out from the limits.
I speak for the entire world when I say that we'll miss you.
author: Sam
